title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Shared Metacognitive Skills Development for Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Experience with Digital Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply shared metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-reflection) through ≥3 online collaborative activities in mobile environments.
Learners can perform collective cognitive regulation with ≥80% success rate via peer interaction during scientific problem-solving.
Learners can revise and implement ≥3 self/team-level learning strategies based on formative assessment data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
